newsitem.title: BELGIUM: CONDOM GIRLS HIT THE BEACHES OF BELGIUM.
newsitem.headline: CONDOM GIRLS HIT THE BEACHES OF BELGIUM.

text.p: Visitors to pop star Michael Jackson's concert in the Belgian coastal resort of Ostend at the end of the month are likely to be accosted by girls dressed as condoms and handing out free samples of their wares.

Condom maker Remed Pharma is taking the opportunity provided by Jackson's August 31 concert to promote its "Preventor" and "Flying Condom" products at the same time as contributing to the national AIDS awareness campaign.
A study earlier this year by rival condom maker Durex found that on average Belgian's use only three condoms a year.
The condom girls aim to hand out 100,000 free samples at Ostend and, a week earlier, at Bruges.
